div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 09:53 am CDT

div.div: Showers and possibly a thunderstorm before 1pm, then showers and thunderstorms after 1pm. Some of the storms could produce heavy rainfall. High near 70. Southeast wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between 1 and 2 inches possible.

Showers and thunderstorms likely, mainly before 1am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. South wind 10 to 15 mph becoming northwest after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.
Cloudy through mid morning, then gradual clearing, with a high near 76. Northwest wind 5 to 15 mph.

p.br: Below are grade-level resources, click on the link to expand for more resources.

ul.li: The purpose of this plan is to support our students, provide answers to questions and outline expectations, provide students with flexibility, continuity of learning, and academic stability throughout this timeframe.

We are committed to providing the best educational experience to all students during this time. The following plan affords the opportunity for enrichment, and on-line activities per grade level that will enhance learning for every student.

li.a: Click here to download the Parent/Student Guide for Early Childhood (PreK - K)
Please click here to access the E-Learning Parent Resource guide provided by Muskogee Early Childhood Center.

ul.li: Teacher and student account are updated nightly according to PowerSchool rosters
Reading Eggs is accessed through the Clever Portal
Reading Eggs provides instructional support for reading in a gamified learning structure.
Happy Numbers is access through the Clever Portal
Happy Numbers is set up by teachers.

Storyline Online® is a free educational resource for children, parents, English language learners and teachers worldwide. The digital library offers a diverse collection of authors, illustrators and topics. Videos are accompanied by activity guides for home and school that include summaries, discussion points and hands-on activities to encourage children to think more deeply about the topic and themes.
Storyline online is access through the Clever portal or directly https://www.storylineonline.net/
No login is required to listen to the stories.

Starfall is a children's website that teaches basic English reading and writing skills. The main demographic is preschoolers, and kindergarteners. It teaches children how to read by using games and phonics.
Starfall is accessed through the direct link https://www.starfall.com/h/
No login is required.
Renaissance myON® Reader is a student-centered, personalized literacy environment that gives students access to more than 6,000 enhanced digital books.
myON is accessed through the Clever Portal or through the direct link https://www.myon.com/school/muskogeebookclub
Student username is: muskogee
Student password is: Books

GoNoodle turns movement into a game and makes it easy to be active, the kid way—silly, energetic, playful, and fun. Just press play on hundreds of custom-created videos and get kids running, jumping, dancing, stretching, and practicing moments of mindfulness.
Accessed through the GoNoodle Icon on the Clever or https://gonoodle.com

The purpose of this plan is to support our students, provide answers to questions and outline expectations, provide students with flexibility, continuity of learning, and academic stability throughout this timeframe.

We are committed to providing the best educational experience to all students during this time. The following plan affords the opportunity for enrichment, and on-line activities per grade level that will enhance learning for every student.

li.a: Click here to download the Parent/Student Guide for Early Childhood (PreK - K)

ul.li: Google Classroom is a free web service, developed by Google for schools, that aims to simplify creating, distributing, and grading assignments in a paperless way. ... Students can be invited to join a class through a private code, or automatically imported from a school domain.
Students are added through a code or teacher invite using a student email address.
Google Classroom is accessed through the Clever portal or through the Google classroom button in the taskbar of student chromebooks
Google Classroom is Muskogee Public Schools Learning Management System. Assignments and announcements will be regularly posted on Google Classroom.
Teacher and student account are updated nightly according to PowerSchool rosters
Reading Eggs is accessed through the Clever Portal
Reading Eggs provides instructional support for reading in a gamified learning structure.
Teacher and student account are updated nightly according to PowerSchool rosters
Study Island is accessed through the Clever Portal
Provides instructional supports for reading, and math.
Teacher and student account are updated nightly according to PowerSchool rosters
Students are assigned a PowerSchool Login.
Accessed through PowerSchool.
Teachers can assign work on Google Classroom.
If your student has lost their log in please contact enrollment at 918-684-3722
Wonders Reading Online is accessed through ConnectED
Students can read assigned books, leveled readers, and have access to worksheets and assignments on ConnectED
ConnectED is accessed through the Clever Portal
Students are Automatically rostered overnight based on PowerSchool rosters.
Some assignments can also be posted on Google Classroom.
Engaging learning games, animated movies, and activities. Designed with relevance, depth, and humor to encourage kids on their unique learning paths.
Subjects include: Science, Social Studies, English, Math, Arts and Music, Health, Engineering and Tech
BrainPop is accessed through the Clever Portal.
District username: muskogeeps
District Password: roughers1
Freckle is accessed through the Clever Portal
Freckle is set up by teachers.
If you are missing your login code please contact your teacher.
Happy Numbers is access through the Clever Portal
Happy Numbers is set up by teachers.

Storyline Online® is a free educational resource for children, parents, English language learners and teachers worldwide. The digital library offers a diverse collection of authors, illustrators and topics. Videos are accompanied by activity guides for home and school that include summaries, discussion points and hands-on activities to encourage children to think more deeply about the topic and themes.
Storyline online is access through the Clever portal or directly https://www.storylineonline.net/
No login is required to listen to the stories.
ReadWorks can be accessed through the Clever Portal.

Starfall is a children's website that teaches basic English reading and writing skills. The main demographic is preschoolers, and kindergarteners. It teaches children how to read by using games and phonics.
Starfall is accessed through the direct link https://www.starfall.com/h/
No login is required.
Renaissance myON® Reader is a student-centered, personalized literacy environment that gives students access to more than 6,000 enhanced digital books.
myON is accessed through the Clever Portal or through the direct link https://www.myon.com/school/muskogeebookclub
Student username is: muskogee
Student password is: Books

GoNoodle turns movement into a game and makes it easy to be active, the kid way—silly, energetic, playful, and fun. Just press play on hundreds of custom-created videos and get kids running, jumping, dancing, stretching, and practicing moments of mindfulness.
Accessed through the GoNoodle Icon on the Clever or https://gonoodle.com

We are committed to providing the best educational experience to all students during this time. The following plan affords the opportunity for enrichment, and on-line activities per grade level that will enhance learning for every student.

Accelerated Reader is a computer-based program that schools may use to monitor reading practice and progress. It helps teachers guide kids to books that are on kids' individual reading levels. Kids take short quizzes after reading a book to check if they've understood it.
Most books on Wonders stories and leveled readers, GetEpic, myON, Follett Library, and other novels have an Accelerated Reader Quiz.
Accelerated Reader is accessed through the Clever Portal in the Renaissance Reading Program.
The monitor password is star

Accelerated Reader is a computer-based program that schools may use to monitor reading practice and progress. It helps teachers guide kids to books that are on kids' individual reading levels. Kids take short quizzes after reading a book to check if they've understood it.
Most books on Wonders stories and leveled readers, GetEpic, myON, Follett Library, and other novels have an Accelerated Reader Quiz.
Accelerated Reader is accessed through the Clever Portal in the Renaissance Reading Program.
The monitor password is star

Storyline Online® is a free educational resource for children, parents, English language learners and teachers worldwide. The digital library offers a diverse collection of authors, illustrators and topics. Videos are accompanied by activity guides for home and school that include summaries, discussion points and hands-on activities to encourage children to think more deeply about the topic and themes.
Storyline online is access through the Clever portal or directly https://www.storylineonline.net/
No login is required to listen to the stories.
ReadWorks can be accessed through the Clever Portal.

BrainPop is accessed through the Clever Portal.
District username: muskogeeps
District Password: roughers1

The Khan Academy is a non-profit educational organization that provides free video tutorials and interactive exercises. The Academy's declared mission is “changing education for the better by providing a free world-class education to anyone anywhere.”
Khan Academy is accessed through Clever or through direct link at https://www.khanacademy.org/
Khan Academy provides independent learning options in many subjects including math, English, Science, SAT test prep, economics, and many other subjects.
If your student does not already have an account set up parents can create an account for use at home.

The purpose of this plan is to support our students, provide answers to questions and outline expectations, provide students with flexibility, continuity of learning, and academic stability throughout this timeframe.

We are committed to providing the best educational experience to all students during this time. The following plan affords the opportunity for enrichment, and on-line activities per grade level that will enhance learning for every student.

li.a: Click here to download the Parent/Student Guide for Secondary

ul.li: Google Classroom is a free web service, developed by Google for schools, that aims to simplify creating, distributing, and grading assignments in a paperless way. ... Students can be invited to join a class through a private code, or automatically imported from a school domain.
Students are added through a code or teacher invite using a student email address.
Google Classroom is accessed through the Clever portal or through the Google classroom button in the taskbar of student chromebooks
Google Classroom is Muskogee Public Schools Learning Management System. Assignments and announcements will be regularly posted on Google Classroom.
Teacher and student account are updated nightly according to PowerSchool rosters
Study Island is accessed through the Clever Portal
Provides instructional supports for reading, and math.
Teacher and student account are updated nightly according to PowerSchool rosters
Students are assigned a PowerSchool Login.
Accessed through PowerSchool.
Teachers can assign work on Google Classroom.
If your student has lost their log in please contact enrollment at 918-684-3722

Epic is the world's leading online children's subscription book service offering immediate, on-demand access to over 35,000 high-quality illustrated books and chapter books for children ages 12 and under.
Epic is accessed through the Clever Portal
Students will need the class code from their teacher
Students can read books for free during school hours. After school hours there is an option for parents to pay for a subscription
Renaissance myON® Reader is a student-centered, personalized literacy environment that gives students access to more than 6,000 enhanced digital books.
myON is accessed through the Clever Portal or through the direct link https://www.myon.com/school/muskogeebookclub
Student username is: muskogee
Student password is: Books
Follett Destiny is Muskogee Public Schools hub for digital book checkouts.
Follett Destiny is accessed through clever
Username:school name
Password: School name
Please do not check out books just open it and read.
Abdo Digital Bookshelf is an free online library that provides a variety of content for students PreK-12.

strong.a: Click here to access Abdo Zoom Online Databases (PreK - 2)

ul.li: ​​​​​​​username: abdo zoom
password: 2020

strong.a: Click here to access Abdo Elementary Digital Bookshelf (PreK - 6)

ul.li: ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​username: ABDO Elementary
password: 2020

strong.a: Click here to access Abdo Secondary Digital Bookshelf (5 - 12)

ChessKid is a great resource for educators looking to use chess to introduce and reinforce literacy, math, critical thinking, and life skills.
Chess Kid is a free online program that teaches students, parents, and teachers how to play chess. There are lessons and students can play against other students or the computer.
ChessKid is accessed through Clever or through the direct link www.chesskid.com
Parents can create a free account for their child if a teacher has not already created one

GoNoodle turns movement into a game and makes it easy to be active, the kid way—silly, energetic, playful, and fun. Just press play on hundreds of custom-created videos and get kids running, jumping, dancing, stretching, and practicing moments of mindfulness.
Accessed through the GoNoodle Icon on the Clever or https://gonoodle.com
Typing Club is an educational platform for keyboarding. It is web-based and fully customizable, so your students can practice in class, at home, or wherever an internet connection can be found.
Typing Club is accessed through Clever.
Students can register for TypingClub using their Google sign-on.
Typing Club is a free program to help students learn how to type. Guided lessons help students learn to type.

Muskogee Public School will continue to provide Occupational and Physical Therapy to students. While we are under social distancing requirements, these sessions will be provided to your student in a virtual method. Your child’s special education teacher will be making contact to schedule these virtual sessions for your student.
Muskogee Public School has provided the following documents. Please select the file that fits your child's goals for suggestions to practice these skills at home.

li.a: Fluency Home Practice
Articulation Home Practice
Communication Home Practice
Language Home Practice
Pragmatics Home Practice

ul.li: Dr. Scott Singleton, professor of psychology, with the University of Central Oklahoma will be providing YouTube videos for parents to support their students. Behavior Central was created two years ago to support teachers as behavior consultants to their students. In light of our new learning environment, they are now providing this same support to parents as they become the consultant to the learning process. These short videos will include topics on positive behavior reinforcement, functions of behavior, and simple learning formats for students. MPS is dedicated to offering and providing the highest quality of supports to you and your family during this time.

li.a: The YouTube channel can be accessed by clicking here.

ul.li: Special Olympics Oklahoma has compiled exercises and tips for Special Athletes and adaptive PE.
This resource can be accessed at https://www.sook.org/stay-fit-at-home-2/

Imagine Learning Language is a robust learning platform for English Language Learners that accelerates reading and English proficiency. Based in the four domains of literacy, reading, writing, listening and speaking, students will enjoy this oral and academic program.

li.p: BrainPOP ELL is a web-based English Language Learning (ELL) program comprised of short, animated movies as well as games, quizzes, and interactive features. It encompasses the four main language skills: listening, speaking, reading, and writing to reinforce academics and learning the English language.

ul.li: Colorín Colorado can be accessed via the Clever Portal or by visiting the link https://www.colorincolorado.org/.
DuoLingo can be accessed via the Clever Portal.

h3.font: Counseling and Social Emotional Information Sheet

ul.li: As we begin distance learning, we understand that students and families may need more than academic and instructional support during this difficult time. This information sheet will provide you with important website links, supports, and counseling services. Muskogee Public Schools will continue to provide counseling services throughout the remainder of the school year. While this will look different in its delivery we are dedicated to the well-being of our students.

strong.a: Please click here to access the Counseling and Social Emotional Information sheet.

ul.li: This Gifted & Talented Learning Menu provides options for family-supported learning at home in the various grade levels of gifted students.

li.a: Click here to access the Gifted & Talented Learning Menu

ul.li: Please visit OETA.tv/LearningAtHome to view the updated program schedule, OETA’s statewide channel list, curriculum and activities. At this link, you will also have access to additional information about PBS LearningMedia, including videos and interactive content, audio, documents and in-depth lesson plans.

Virtual field trips can provide a different way of learning, and expose children to areas of culture, science, health and literature they have not yet experienced. These free, fun and educational tours will bring the outside world into your home. We have compiled a listing of virtual extended learning opportunities for you to share in with your student. These sites will increase engagement and break-up the monotony online work for your child’s learning experience. As always, we are dedicated to providing the highest quality and well-rounded educational experience to your student.

li.a: Click here to view a list of Virtual Field Trips compiled by MPS
